Ashraf Fahmy bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Ijipt, nke na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Ijipti kemgbe ngwụcha afọ 1960

E nyere ya otuto site na ịmalite ọrụ ya ma duzie ihe nkiri mbụ ya (The Killers - n'asụsụ Arabic: القتلة) nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri Salah Zulfikar na-eme nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma. Fahmy bụ onye nduzi nwere obi ike nke a na-ahụkarị na mmemme ihe nkiri n'ụwa niile, na mgbakwunye, o dere edemede nke ihe nkiri atọ gụnyere (Until The End of Lifetime), nke a na-ewere dị ka ihe nkiri ya a kachasị echeta.

Ashraf Fahmy nwetara nzere Bachelor of Arts (History major) na Mahadum Cairo na 1961, mgbe ahụ ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Egyptian High Cinema Institute na Giza na 1963 iji malite ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Egypt, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ gụrụ Directing na Mahadim California site na 1964 ruo 1967.

Fahmy rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi na "National Center for Documentary Seetma", ọ duziri ihe nkiri mkpirikpi mbụ ya nke a kpọrọ A New Life ma nye ya ihe nrite maka ihe nkiri a na "Dok Leipzigfilm festival", wee rụọ ọrụ dị ka osote Fatin Abdel Wahab, Abduel Rahman Khamisi na Youssef Chahine, mgbe ahụ ọ duziri Ihe nkiri mbụ ya The Killers (1971).
A mụrụ Ashraf Fahmy ma zụlite ya na Cairo, ọ bụ nwa nwoke nke a mụrụ nye nna Ijipt nke ezinụlọ dị elu nke Cairo na nne Turkish

Ọ lụrụ nwanyị ugboro abụọ ma nwee otu nwa nwoke Mostafa Ashraf Fahmiطفى مصطفى أشرفي na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ Jala Fahmy جالا ڕاستي site na nne dị iche na Ingy, Ọ nwụrụ na mbido afọ 2001 n'oge ịwa ahụ obi na-ahapụ ihe ncheta na sinima Ijipt.

Ebe ọ bụ na ihe nkiri mbụ ya (The Killers - n'asụsụ Arabic: القتلة) nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri Egypt bụ Salah Zulfikar mere ka ọ nwee ihe ịga nke ọma na ụlọ ọrụ ịkụ nzọ, ihe nkiri ya nke afọ 1970s, 1980s na 1990s nyere ya aha dị ka onye nduzi nke ihe egwu
O sonyere na Cinema Council Adarhmassh na 1969, e wee họpụta ya dị ka Onye isi oche nke ndị nduzi nke Studios, Production na High investment na 1977
N'oge ọrụ ya niile, ọ duziri, dee ma mepụta ihe nkiri 50.
Emume ihe nkiri Egypt, Middle East & International sọpụrụ Fahmy
Ihe nrite ya a ma ama bụ maka ihe nkiri ndụ ọhụrụ na mmemme ihe nkiri Dok Leipzig nke Leipzig, East Germany.
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri Salah Zulfikar
